Package com.bookingmx.reservation.repository

Interface ReservationRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryReservationRepository
public interface ReservationRepository
Repository interface for managing reservation data persistence. This interface defines the contract for data access operations related to reservations. Implementations of this interface should handle data storage and retrieval, whether from memory, database, file system, or other storage mechanisms.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
BookingMx Development Team

  • Method Details

    • save

      Reservation save(Reservation reservation)
      Saves a new reservation to the repository. If a reservation with the same ID already exists, it will be updated.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reservation to save
      Returns:
      the saved reservation
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if reservation is null

    • update

      Reservation update(Reservation reservation)
      Updates an existing reservation in the repository.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reservation to update
      Returns:
      the updated reservation
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if reservation is null or doesn't exist

    • findById

      Optional<Reservation> findById(String id)
      Finds a reservation by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the reservation to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the reservation if found, empty otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is null or empty

    • findAll

      List<Reservation> findAll()
      Retrieves all reservations from the repository.
      Returns:
      a list of all reservations (empty list if none exist)

    • delete

      boolean delete(String id)
      Deletes a reservation from the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the reservation to delete
      Returns:
      true if the reservation was deleted, false if it didn't exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is null or empty

    • exists

      boolean exists(String id)
      Checks if a reservation exists with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to check
      Returns:
      true if a reservation exists with this ID, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is null or empty

    • count

      int count()
      Gets the total count of reservations in the repository.
      Returns:
      the number of reservations

    • clear

      void clear()
      Removes all reservations from the repository. Use with caution - this operation cannot be undone.
